entry.title: Fwd: Block Size Increase Requirements
entry.summary: In the context given, it is mentioned that miners in China cannot carry on forever if they can't meet the bandwidth requirements through their firewall. It is stated that no one has an inherent right to mine if they cannot do the job. If Chinese miners cannot compete and get outcompeted, then it is too bad and others will have to carry on without them. However, the author suggests that this should not be a big deal as they can run a node on a server in Taiwan and connect the hardware to it via a VPN or so.
